title: The Glare Ends
description: Jenna is fiercely protective of the people she rescued when the apocalypse struck, and she's determined to keep them safe, no matter what. But there's more to survival than finding enough food and being self-reliant, and life gets complicated when Jenna and the other survivors meet new people, especially when they threaten everything Jenna believes...and her budding relationship with Josh. Pick up a copy of this fast-paced page turner today!
author: Anissa Stringer
